import re

def eradicate_and_reverse(sentence):
    sentence = re.sub('', ' ', sentence)
    words = sentence.split(' ')
    sentence = ' '.join(reversed(words))
    sentence = re.sub(' ,', ',', sentence)
    sentence = re.sub(' -', '-', sentence)
    sentence = re.sub(' !', '!', sentence)
    return sentence

import re

def eradicate_and_reverse(sentence):
    sentence = re.sub(' +', '', sentence)
    words = sentence.split(' ')
    sentence = ' '.join(reversed(words))
    sentence = re.sub(' ,', ',', sentence)
    sentence = re.sub(' -', '-', sentence)
    sentence = re.sub(' !', '!', sentence)
    return sentence
